text:
Are there any good examples of Julia str macros with a postfix. I haven't seen one in the wild and I cannot actually find the syntax in <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/metaprogramming> .

For example:
```macro foo_str(str, postfix)
    print(str, postfix)
end

foo"bar"baz #barbaz```

elements.text: Are there any good examples of Julia str macros with a postfix. I haven't seen one in the wild and I cannot actually find the syntax in

text: `@r_str` for regexes is one example in Base

text: TIL! ... so is it intentionally undocumented?

text: Docu PRs so far were super painful for me. Is there a way to test docstring tweaks w/o rebuilding the whole sysimage?

text: I have an unmerged PR, which allows running these using Revise: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/38258>

text: Since those changes usually don't have many unexpected side effects though, making a PR without testing locally is probably fine
